testcase.description:
Topology to use PC1++++++ Switch+++++++PC2 + + + + PC3 PC4
Description Check broadcast packets forwarding Platform Dependence Chesapeake Pre-condition ? PC1,PC2,PC3 connect to switch port1,port2,port3 ? PC1,PC2,PC3 are in same vlan 10 ? PC4 connect to switch port4, and in vlan 40 Test procedure 1. Set PC2,PC3,PC4 to capture frames 2. PC1 send untagged broadcast frames Result1 3. PC1 send priority-untagged broadcast frames Result2 Expect result Result1: PC2,PC3 should receive all the packets sent from PC1 PC4 don’t receive any packets, because PC4 are in vlan20
Result2: PC2, PC3 should receive all the packets sent from PC1 PC4 don’t receive any packets, because PC4 are in vlan 20

step.desc: configure 3 access ports in the same vlan
step.telnet: -v "vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "vlan ${tb.vlan2}" -v "interface ${sw1.port1} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port2} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port3} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface ${sw1.port4} switchport access vlan ${tb.vlan2}" -v "show vlan brief" -v "show vlan summary" -v "show vlan id ${tb.vlan1}" -v "show vlan id ${tb.vlan2}" -v "show mac-address-table all" -v "show interface"

step.desc: build stream, port1 sends untagged broadcast pkts
check FDB,make sure the mac entries aren't changed
analyse statistics on rxport, only port2 and port3 received pkts
build stream, port1 sends priority-untagged broadcast pkts
step.ssh:
-v "tclsh8.5" -v "package req ixia" -v "" -v "ah_ixia_connect -def diable -chassisIP ${pub.chassis1.ip} -tclServerIP ${pub.tclserver1.ip} -userName ${job.user}${job.sid} -portList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port},${sw1.port4.ixia_port} -phyList ${sw1.port1.phytype},${sw1.port2.phytype},${sw1.port3.phytype},${sw1.port4.phytype}" -v "" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port3.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "stream_maintance -onePort ${sw1.port4.ixia_port} -streamId all -maintanceOp disable" -v "traffic_configure_eth2 -portListIn ${sw1.port1.ixia_port},${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port},${sw1.port4.ixia_port} -mac_dst ffff.ffff.ffff -mac_src ${sw1.port1.ixia_port.mac} -vlan enable -vlan_id 0 -vlan_dot1p 1 -vlan_cfi 0 -eth2_protocol 0x0800 -udf_offset 38 -patternOffset2 34" -v ""
-v "start_trans_getstats -txPortList ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -rxPortList ${sw1.port2.ixia_port},${sw1.port3.ixia_port},${sw1.port4.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port2.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port3.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "check_equal_tx_with_rx -oneTxPort ${sw1.port1.ixia_port} -oneRxPort ${sw1.port4.ixia_port}" -v "" -v "ctrl-c"

analyse statistics on rxport, only port2 and port3 received pkts
